    • Uses of Configuration in eu.stratosphere.nephele.client

      Methods in eu.stratosphere.nephele.client that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration JobClient.getConfiguration()
      Returns the Configuration object which can include special configuration settings for the job client.
      Constructors in eu.stratosphere.nephele.client with parameters of type Configuration 
      Constructor and Description
      JobClient(JobGraph jobGraph, Configuration configuration)
      Constructs a new job client object and instantiates a local RPC proxy for the JobSubmissionProtocol.
      JobClient(JobGraph jobGraph, Configuration configuration, java.net.InetSocketAddress jobManagerAddress)
      Constructs a new job client object and instantiates a local RPC proxy for the JobSubmissionProtocol.

    • Uses of Configuration in eu.stratosphere.nephele.configuration

      Methods in eu.stratosphere.nephele.configuration that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Configuration GlobalConfiguration.getConfiguration()
      Copies the key/value pairs stored in the global configuration to a Configuration object and returns it.
      static Configuration GlobalConfiguration.getConfiguration(java.lang.String[] keys)
      Copies a subset of the key/value pairs stored in the global configuration to a Configuration object and returns it.
      Methods in eu.stratosphere.nephele.configuration with parameters of type Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Configuration.addAll(Configuration other, java.lang.String prefix)
      Adds all entries from the given configuration into this configuration.
      static void GlobalConfiguration.includeConfiguration(Configuration conf)
      Merges the given Configuration object into the global configuration.

    • Uses of Configuration in eu.stratosphere.nephele.execution

      Methods in eu.stratosphere.nephele.execution that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration Environment.getJobConfiguration()
      Returns the job configuration object which was attached to the original JobGraph.
      Configuration Environment.getTaskConfiguration()
      Returns the task configuration object which was attached to the original JobVertex.

    • Uses of Configuration in eu.stratosphere.nephele.jobgraph

      Methods in eu.stratosphere.nephele.jobgraph that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration AbstractJobVertex.getConfiguration()
      Returns the vertex's configuration object which can be used to pass custom settings to the task at runtime.
      Configuration JobGraph.getJobConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration object for this job if it is set.
      Configuration JobGraph.getTaskmanagerConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration object distributed among the task managers before they start processing this job.
